name: Edujobs Academy Pvt Ltd
description: Edujobs, an initiative of 2COMS Group is dedicated to upskilling the youths of India with in-demand certification programs. EduJobs Academy is revolutionising the way skill development and employment generation is looked at in India. With a pan- India ecosystem for skill development, EduJobs is fast becoming the go-to place for talented and trained skill resources. Our certification programs are 100% job-oriented and designed to inculcate the knowledge and skills needed to excel in today's job market. Our courses are equipped with lessons/lectures from industry experts, practical classes/internships, and a personalized feedback system to track on learner's progress.
features: A national-level player in the skill development
Extensive focus on job-oriented & skill based learning
Government affiliated fee-based and free courses
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Making India The Skill Capital of the World
ShortDescription: JobsAcademy is the career courses wing of 2COMS Group. JobsAcademy specializes in career aligned courses with market orientation.
enhanced_description: Edujobs Academy Pvt Ltd, an initiative of 2COMS Group, is a national-level player focused on revolutionizing skill development and employment generation in India. Operating with a pan-India ecosystem, the Academy specializes in upskilling youths with in-demand, 100% job-oriented certification programs designed to instill the knowledge and skills needed to excel in today's job market. Their offerings include government-affiliated fee-based and free courses, featuring lessons and lectures from industry experts, practical classes, internships, and a personalized feedback system for learner progress tracking. As the career courses wing of 2COMS Group, Edujobs Academy is dedicated to making India the skill capital of the world through career-aligned courses with strong market orientation.
key_use_cases: Skill development for job seekers and youths
Corporate workforce upskilling and reskilling programs
Managing and delivering corporate training initiatives
competitive_advantages: National-level presence and pan-India ecosystem for skill development
Extensive focus on 100% job-oriented and skill-based learning
Credibility and accessibility through government-affiliated courses (both free and paid)
High-quality content delivered by industry experts
Emphasis on practical application through classes and internships
Personalized feedback system for effective learner progress tracking
implementation_scenarios: Partnerships with government skill development initiatives
roi_benefits: Enhanced workforce skills and capabilities for organizations
Improved efficiency in skill development and learning outcomes
Effective utilization of training resources leading to training effectiveness
Contribution to employment generation and reduction of skill gaps
primary_users: Individual learners (youths and professionals seeking upskilling/certification)
